SELECT f.faulty_code, f.statement_number, i.item_name, c.category_small FROM faulty f INNER JOIN item i ON f.item_code = i.item_code INNER JOIN category c ON f.faulty_category = c.category_code
ORDER BY f.statement_number DESC LIMIT ${beginRow}, ${pagePerRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM faulty f INNER JOIN item i ON f.item_code = i.item_code INNER JOIN category c ON f.faulty_category = c.category_code
SELECT item_code, item_name FROM item ORDER BY item_code ASC
SELECT category_code, category_small FROM category WHERE category_code LIKE '8%'

SELECT f.faulty_code, f.statement_number, i.item_name, c.category_small , f.faulty_amount, f.faulty_image, f.faulty_reason FROM faulty f INNER JOIN item i ON f.item_code = i.item_code INNER JOIN category c ON f.faulty_category = c.category_code WHERE f.faulty_code = #{faultyCode}

SELECT f.faulty_code, f.statement_number, i.item_name, c.category_small , f.faulty_amount, f.faulty_image, f.faulty_reason FROM faulty f INNER JOIN item i ON f.item_code = i.item_code INNER JOIN category c ON f.faulty_category = c.category_code INNER JOIN `order` o ON f.statement_number = o.statement_number INNER JOIN branch_employee b ON o.local_category_code = b.local_category_code AND o.shop_code = b.shop_code WHERE branch_employee_code = #{branchEmployeeCode} ORDER BY f.statement_number DESC
